places.name: NOVA KROVA
places.desc: Place to go to if you are around, though never would be on the top of the list. I wasn't amazed by the food and the service

places.name: Glonojad
places.desc: Cool place. lots of vegan and vegetarian options from lots of different cousines! I highly recommend this places for people who appreciate great taste

places.name: MOMO
places.desc: Cool place. lots of vegan and vegetarian options from lots of different cousines! I highly recommend this places for people who appreciate great taste

places.name: Chimera
places.desc: Very nice deco, more so for lunch than dinner. Good to visit, but not a must go for a veggie person. Not suitable for vegans

places.name: Vegab
places.desc: Little and cosy place with huge portions of vegan food with fried marinated tofu that gets you very full. Delicious

places.name: Hummus Amamamusi
places.desc: The best hummus in the city. Have it in a pit with some japanelos

places.name: Bio Market
places.desc: Variety of helthy and bio products
